title: Oishinbo: Kyuukyoku tai Shikou, Chouju Ryouri Taiketsu!!
alternative_title: Oishinbo: Utimate vs. Supremacy, 美味しんぼ　究極対至高　長寿料理対決!!
description: Ultimate Menu and Supreme Menu square off in a cooking battle about dishes that promote longevity. For Supreme's Kaibara Yuzan and Ultimate's Yamaoka Shirou (who are father and son), this confrontation is more than strictly business: it's personal.
